Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Jar in the shape of a flattened ball, endowed with a low cylindrical neck which terminates in a simple, slightly convex lip. Made from a pink clay and carefully polished, it is decorated with thin pink and dark brown horizontal stripes framing wide reddish-brown bands. The surface has flaked off a lot.
